name: vlsa
tagline: A system for identifying latent scene attributes in videos (vlsa) using knowledge acquired from large collections of text documents.
body:
vlsa
====

More information coming soon ...


## Video Datasets

* 26 chase videos and annotations: [[chase.zip](http://trananh.github.io/data/vlsa/chase.zip)]
* 45 hug videos and annotations (split into 2 parts): [[hug-1.zip](http://trananh.github.io/data/vlsa/hug-1.zip)], [[hug-2.zip](http://trananh.github.io/data/vlsa/hug-2.zip)]
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
